VideoCallRecording.name: VideoCallRecording
VideoCallRecording.description: Represents a recording from a video call, such as a video recording, a voice recording, or a transcript.

DurationInSeconds.description: The video call duration in seconds, not the recording duration.

EndDateTime.description: Time the call ended, in universal time coordinated (UTC).

ExpirationDateTime.description: Reserved for internal use. This field is available in API version 59.0 and later.

ExternalRecordingKey.description: The ID of the video call recording, from the recording provider. For example, the Zoom ID of the recording. This value is unique.

ExternalRecordingKeyLong.description: The ID of the video call recording, from the recording provider, that's more than 255 characters. For example, the MS Team ID of the recording. This value is unique.

FileSizeInByte.description: The size of the video call recording, in bytes.

FileType.description: The file type of the video call recording.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

Name.description: The name of the video call recording, entered by the sales rep.

StartDateTime.description: The start time of the video call recording.

VideoCallRecordId.description: ID of the VideoCall record (the parent record).
